title: Large-caliber bullet hits car during Cherokee County road rage
title_page: Large-caliber bullet hits car during Cherokee County road rage
text:
Cherokee County deputies are investigating a shots fired report after a car was struck by a large-caliber bullet Saturday night.
A Jasper couple told deputies their teenage grandson was in the car with them when someone opened fire about 10 p.m. Saturday, spokesman Lt. Jay Baker said in a news release.
They were on Reinhardt College Parkway near the Highway 5 connector in Canton, when they pulled out in front of a car. That’s when they heard multiple shots.
No one was hurt by the gunfire, but a round hit the couple’s car.
Baker said no one could provide a description of the suspect's vehicle.
Anyone with any information or who may have witnessed the incident is asked to call 911.
